content.description: Up on the approach to porcupine peak sits a picturesque crag nestled in the rain forest. it is clearly visible from the road. In order to get up to the area, you have to cut through Alaska Mountain Guides area of operation. Be advised that at any point during the summer a number of tours could be running at any time. This area is for the most part utilized by IWLS and AMG students/guides. If you aren't affiliated with AMG or IWLS i'd recommend cutting through the site at "off hours". Good luck!
